validation.unavailable-symbols: Prohibited special characters have been introduced
validation.password-min-length: The password must contain at least {n} characters
validation.password-need-specsymbol: The password must contain at least one special character

ui.file-too-large: The uploaded file is too large, the maximum size is {n} MB
ui.file-accept-formats: Only {n} formats are available for upload
ui.no-contacts: The user did not specify his contacts
ui.no-address: The user did not specify his address
ui.password-recover-info: An email with the steps to restore your password will be sent to the email you specified!

menu.no-login: Log in to your account or register a new one to get access to the unique functionality!

footer.help-about: Republican telephone hotline for providing psychological assistance to minors in a crisis situation

reviews.no-reviews: No one has left a review for you yet!
reviews.no-reviews-explain: Ask your clients to leave feedback about the consultations. Reviews help other customers find you.

timetable.info-text:
This schedule is static and is transferred to each week automatically.
            The user has access to an entry for this schedule for 7 days ahead.
            If you do not have time to change the schedule in advance, the user will be able to make an appointment with
            you need a consultation, and for its cancellation or skipping you will be awarded penalty points.

classes.no-classes: There are no records for the selected date!
classes.delete-class-confirm:
Penalty points will be awarded to you for canceling a class. ' +
                'If the initiative does not come from you, inform the client about the possibility of canceling the class without penalties!
classes.report-class-success: Your request will be processed in the near future

materials.no-materials-title: You haven't added the materials yet!
materials.no-materials-caption: Add your own unique content and share it with your customers or other users
materials.no-readers: You have not yet granted access to this material to other users
materials.delete-material-confirm: Do you really want to delete this material? Deleting the material will make it inaccessible to all readers

qualification.education-description:
Each specified educational institution is confirmed separately according to the attached documents. The maximum
 number of educational institutions is 5. In case of refusal, an email will be sent to your email with an indication of the reason.
qualification.category-description:
After adding a new qualification, you need to wait for its confirmation. In case of refusal, an email with the reason will be sent to your email
.
qualification.delete-education-confirm: Information about this educational institution will be deleted, and its confirmation will be canceled
qualification.delete-education-success: information about the educational institution has been successfully deleted
qualification.name: Name

security.about-password-change:
Changing the password is necessary to ensure your security, the Soul Works team highly recommends changing
            temporary passwords,
            which are installed for your account when restoring access to it.
security.change-password-confirm: Your account password will be changed and all active sessions will be completed within 5 minutes.
security.change-password-success: A link to change the password has been sent to your email
security.delete-session-confirm: The session on the selected device will be terminated, and you will need to log in again to continue working.

edit-personal-data.about-social-links:
You can specify the IDs of your social
            networks to go to them by click. The identifier is a simple string without special characters.
edit-personal-data.about-phone: You can specify which social networks or messengers are available by this number.

registration.offline-class-price-label: Price for 1 hour of online consultation
registration.agree: Price for 1 hour of online consultation
registration.confirm-info: An email has been sent to your email address to confirm registration
registration.user-warn:
Remember! The data entered on this tab will be available to psychologists and other users of the site if
          if you want to remain anonymous, use a pseudonym. You can change your first and last name at any time in
          your personal account.

booking.no-time: There are no available seats for the selected date
booking.add-success: You have successfully signed up for a consultation
